body: So, my full screen is way too annoying, every time that I try and go into it, it will flash strobe lights all over my screen, and I have to close it down. I need to turn full screen on and off around 10 times before it stops flashing. As well, whenever I play, the full screen will just turn off mid fight for no  reason, and it seems as if it only ever happens when I'm fighting. Has anyone had this problem? If so, did you fix it? And how?
